00142 class NT3D_solid_o : public NT3D_surfaced_object_o {
00143 public:
00144   NT3D_solid_o(const NT_vector3_o & oNewPosition = NT_OriginVec3());
00145   NT3D_solid_o(const NT3D_solid_o & original);
00146   const NT3D_solid_o & operator= (const NT3D_solid_o & right);
00147   ~NT3D_solid_o();
00148   /*   Methods                */  
00149   void Scale( NT_vector3_o oDeltaScaling );
00150   void ScaleX ( NTreal deltaSclX);
00151   void ScaleY ( NTreal deltaSclY);
00152   void ScaleZ ( NTreal deltaSclZ);
00153   void ScaleXYZ ( NTreal deltaSclXYZ );
00154   void ScaleUnit(){ oScaling = NT_vector3_o(1.0,1.0,1.0);}
00155   
00156   /*   Data                   */  
00157   protected:
00158   /*   Methods                */  
00159   void DrawSurfacedObj();
00160   virtual void DrawSolidObj() const {NT_CERR(1,"NT3D_solid_o::DrawSolidObj() - Error : This method should be overridden by a derived class.");};
00161   void ControlSurfacedObj(NT3Dcontroller cntrl , NTint value);
00162   /*   Data                   */  
00164   GLUquadricObj * pQuadObj;
00165   GLint slices;
00166   GLint stacks;
00167   NT_vector3_o oScaling;
00168   NTint drawStyle;
00169   private:
00170   /*   Methods                */  
00171   void InitQuadric();
00172  
00173   /*   Data                   */
00174 };
